input.sentences: she is happy to see her grandparents .
then they slept on the couch .
output.sentences: Amy was happy to see her grandparents.
She worked hard to prepare a meal her grandma loved eating.
Wine was put on the table to serve whenever ready.
After everyone finished eating they gathered on the couch to talk.
It was a good meal and a good time for Amys grandparents but they retired and slept on the couch.
